SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GETTITLEGENDER
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get Title Gender - 0 = unisex, 1 = male, 2 = female
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Nolan Regenwether
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GETTITLEGENDER(@TITLEGUID uniqueidentifier) returns tinyint with execute as caller as begin -- 0 if unisex, 1 if male, 2 if female DECLARE @RESULT tinyint = 0
SELECT @RESULT = isnull(tp.GENDER, 0) FROM dbo.USR_TITLEPROPERTIES tp WHERE (@TITLEGUID IS NULL OR tp.TITLECODEID = @TITLEGUID)
IF @RESULT IS NULL SET @RESULT = 0
return @RESULT end
